text.div:
JP_Organization_InsuranceOrganizationCategory_SP

Parameter jp-insurance-organizationcategory:token

OrganizationリソースのInsuranceOrganizationCategory(点数表コード)に関する検索を定義する。

ResourceOrganization
ExpressionOrganization.extension.where(url='http://jpfhir.jp/fhir/core/Extension/StructureDefinition/JP_Organization_InsuranceOrganizationCategory').value.as(code)
Processing ModeNormal
MultiplesThe parameter can repeat (and) and can have repeating values (or)

name: JP_Organization_InsuranceOrganizationCategory_SP
publisher: FHIR Japanese implementation research working group in Japan Association of Medical Informatics (JAMI)

contact.name: FHIR Japanese implementation research working group in Japan Association of Medical Informatics (JAMI)

description: OrganizationリソースのInsuranceOrganizationCategory(点数表コード)に関する検索を定義する。
